resources.string: Do you want to add %s to your address book?
Set for all accounts on this device
Are you sure that you want to verify your contacts OTR fingerprint?
Leave empty to authenticate w/ certificate
Your device is doing some heavy battery optimizations on TenguChat that might lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\n\nYou will now be asked to disable those.
Your device is doing some heavy battery optimizations on TenguChat that might lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\nIt is recommended to disable those.
Would you like to block %s from sending you messages?
Enter the text from the image above
Do you want to delete all messages within this Conversation?\n\nWarning: This will not influence messages stored on other devices or servers.

Are you sure you want to clear all other devices from the OMEMO announcement? The next time your devices connect, they will reannounce themselves, but they might not receive messages sent in the meantime.
%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Google Play services requires an action
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
You are banned from this group
You have been kicked from this conference
You are no longer in this conference
Contact added you to contact list
TenguChat is unable to encrypt your messages because your contact is not announcing his or hers public key.\n\nPlease ask your contact to setup OpenPGP.
%s has read up to this point
TenguChat is unable to encrypt your messages because your contacts are not announcing their public key.\n\nPlease ask your contacts to setup OpenPGP.
By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of TenguChat\nWarning: This will use your XMPP account to send the stack trace to the developer.
Decryption failed. Maybe you don’t have the proper private key.
Your device does not support opting out of battery optimization
Your device does not support the selection of client certificates!
Download failed: Could not connect to host
Download failed: Could not write file
Error while converting the image file
General I/O error. Maybe you ran out of storage space?
There are no usable keys available for this contact. If you have purged any of their keys, they need to generate new ones.
There are no usable keys available for this contact.\nFetching new keys from the server has been unsuccessful. Maybe there is something wrong with your contacts server.
The file you selected is not an image
Out of memory. Image is too large
Something went wrong while converting your picture
Your server does not support the publication of avatars
Could not save avatar to disk
The app you used to select this image did not provide us with enough permissions to read the file.\n\nUse a different file manager to choose an image
Encrypted message. Please install OpenKeychain to decrypt.
This is not a valid conference name
This is not a valid Jabber ID
This is not a valid username
Jabber ID does not match certificate
A fast ImageView (and Drawable) that supports rounded corners (and ovals or circles) based on the original example from Romain Guy.

We will guide you through the process of creating an account on TenguChat.im.\nWhen picking TenguChat.im as a provider you will be able to communicate with users of other providers by giving them your full Jabber ID.
Carefully compare the fingerprint shown below with the fingerprint of your contact.\nYou can use any trusted form of communication like an encrypted e-mail or a telephone call to exchange those.
If you delete your account your entire conversation history will be lost
Do you want to connect anyway?
Server could not authenticate as \"%s\". The certificate is only valid for:
The server certificate is not signed by a known Certificate Authority.
No application found to display location
No application found to open file
No application found to share URI
You already trust this contact. By selecting \'done\' you are just confirming that %s is part of this conference.
No valid OTR session has been found!
TenguChat need access to external storage
This is not a valid port number
You are not connected. Try again later
The contact is not in your roster. Would you like to add it?
This is not a valid hostname

TenguChat utilizes a third party app called OpenKeychain to encrypt and decrypt messages and to manage your public keys.

OpenKeychain is licensed under GPLv3 and available on F-Droid and Google Play.

(Please restart TenguChat afterwards.)
OpenPGP public key has been published.
(Or long press to bring back default)
Send a message to start an encrypted chat

TenguChat • the very last word in instant messaging.

Allow your contacts to retroactively edit their messages
Respect the autojoin flag in conference bookmarks
Marks your resource as away when the screen is turned off
Let all your contacts know when you use TenguChat
Let your contact know when you are writing a new message
Use room’s subject instead of JID to identify conferences
Let your contact know when you have received and read a message
Change the emoticons key to an enter key
Warning: This could lead to message loss
All certificates must be manually approved
Use enter key to send message
Always send messages encrypted (except for conferences)
Preemptively grant and ask for presence subscription for contacts you created
Prevents the operating system from killing your connection
Blink notification light when a new message arrives
Touch your avatar to change your presence
By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of TenguChat
The length of time TenguChat keeps quiet after seeing activity on another device
Notify when a new message arrives
Replace send button with quick action
Notifications will be silenced during quiet hours
Immediately return to previous activity instead of opening the conversation after sharing something
Show hostname and port settings when setting up an account
Play sound when a new message arrives
Marks your resource as not available when device is on vibrate
Use blue background for received messages
Received messages will be marked with a green tick if supported
Use larger font sizes across the entire app
Colorize send button to indicate contact status
Tunnel all connections through the Tor network. Requires Orbot
Show received messages as black text on a white background
Vibrate when a new message arrives
Marks your resource as not available when device is in silent mode
The name this client identifies itself with
Unable to connect to multiple accounts
Please note: Everyone subscribed to your presence updates will be allowed to see this picture.
Are you sure you want to purge this key?
It will irreversibly be considered compromised, and you can never build a session with it again.
Would you like to remove %s as a bookmark? The conversation associated with this bookmark will not be removed.
Would you like to remove %s from your roster? The conversation associated with this contact will not be removed.
You are trying to remove %s from a public conference. The only way to do that is to ban that user for ever.
Remember to republish your OpenPGP public keys!
Please request presence updates from your contact first.\n\nThis will be used to determine what client(s) your contact is using.
A secure password has been generated
The selected area is too large
Your shared secret can not be empty
Your hint should not be empty
Your contact would like to verify your fingerprint by challenging you with a shared secret. Your contact provided the following hint or question for that secret.

If you and your contact have a secret in common that no one else knows (like an inside joke or simply what you had for lunch the last time you met) you can use that secret to verify each other’s fingerprints.\n\nYou provide a hint or a question for your contact who will respond with a case-sensitive answer.
Are you sure you would like to delete this fingerprint?

TenguChat wants to match your XMPP roster with your contacts to show their full names and avatars.

TenguChat will only read your contacts and match them locally without uploading them to your server.

You will now be asked to grant permission to access your contacts.
Touch avatar to select picture from gallery
Touch here to manage your accounts
Would you like to unblock %s and allow them to send you messages?
XMPP is a provider independent protocol.\nTenguChat was created, to help people join the world of free communication.\nPlese select how you want to continue.
Warning: Sending this without mutual presence updates could cause unexpected problems.\n\nGo to contact details to verify your presence subscriptions.
Your full Tengu ID will be: %s
